function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Study of historical developments in a field may miss potential risks related to contagious diseases in the built environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of overlooking measures to mitigate disease propagation in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Integrate public health experts and epidemiologists into the study of historical developments to assess and address disease propagation risks.","Technologies":"Public health data analysis tools, epidemiological modeling software, building simulation software.","People":"Researchers, scholars, and practitioners studying historical developments in scientific fields.","Owner":"Public health institutions, research organizations, and academic institutions."},{"Description":"Use of topic modeling and data analysis methods may not account for public health and disease propagation considerations in the built environment.","Impact":"Failure to address disease transmission risks in the built environment using the developed methods and models.","Mitigation":"Incorporate public health and epidemiological data into the topic modeling and data analysis to capture disease transmission patterns and inform mitigation strategies.","Technologies":"Data integration platforms, public health databases, disease modeling software.","People":"Data analysts, researchers, and practitioners using topic modeling and data analysis methods.","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions, and government agencies."}]}
